item.title: How it was build
item.description: The site is built by Hugo with Hugo-Octopress theme. I have bumped into this theme coinsidentaly on this blog http://blog.pnkfx.org/. If you guess what is the thing in the header. This is my take on awesome octupus from the original theme http://octopress.org/ page. The idea that it resembles a shot from Ninja Turtles tv series. source - https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/ We override the original theme a little bit to be more compatible with original site.
